prompt: Design a dark-themed chat page interface with a sleek black background. Include an app bar with a white back arrow, a circular avatar with a purple background for 'John Doe', and a white menu icon. The title 'John Doe' should be in white. Below, create a scrollable message list with sent messages in purple rounded rectangles aligned right and received messages in dark gray rounded rectangles aligned left, both with smooth corners and adequate spacing. At the bottom, add a message input area with a dark gray background, a text field with a subtle purple border and hint 'Type a message...', and a purple circular send button with a white send icon. The input area should have a thin purple top border and be spaced evenly from the screen edges.
